item.title: 英伟达豪掷 50 亿美元押注英特尔
item.guid: 英伟达豪掷-50-亿美元押注英特尔
item.description:
Reuters reported yesterday that Nvidia announced it would spend $5 billion to acquire approximately 4% of Intel's shares and reach a deep cooperation agreement covering PC and data center chips. This move not only makes Nvidia a significant shareholder in Intel but also marks a strategic alliance between the two American chip giants in the AI era. 路透社昨日报道，英伟达宣布将斥资 50 亿美元 收购英特尔约 4% 的股份，并与其达成一项涵盖 PC 与数据中心芯片的深度合作协议。此举不仅使英伟达成为英特尔的重要股东，也标志着两家美国芯片巨头在 AI 时代的战略联手。

Nvidia announced in an article on its official WeChat public account early this morning that it would purchase Intel common stock at a price of $23.28 per share, which is slightly lower than the previous trading day's closing price of $24.90, but higher than the price at which the U.S. government previously acquired shares at $20.47 per share. 英伟达今日凌晨在其官方微信公众号发文表示，将以每股 23.28 美元的价格购买英特尔普通股，该价格略低于前一交易日收盘价 24.90 美元，但高于美国政府此前以每股 20.47 美元收购的价格。

Nvidia stated in the article, "Both parties achieve seamless architectural interconnection through NVIDIA NVLink technology — integrating NVIDIA's strengths in AI and accelerated computing with Intel's advanced CPU technology and x86 ecosystem, to provide cutting-edge solutions for customers." 英伟达在文中称，「双方通过 NVIDIA NVLink 技术实现架构无缝互连 —— 融合 NVIDIA 在 AI 与加速计算领域的优势，以及英特尔先进的 CPU 技术与 x86 生态，为客户提供前沿解决方案。」

This cooperation does not involve Intel's foundry business, but both parties will jointly develop AI chips with high-speed interconnect technology. This technology can achieve faster data transfer between GPUs and CPUs, which is expected to pose a direct challenge to AMD and Broadcom in the AI server market. Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang stated: "This historic collaboration closely integrates Nvidia's AI and accelerated computing platform with Intel's CPU and x86 ecosystem, laying the foundation for next-generation computing." 此次合作不涉及英特尔的代工业务，但双方将联合开发具备高速互联技术的 AI 芯片。该技术可实现 GPU 与 CPU 间更快的数据传输，有望在 AI 服务器市场中对 AMD 与博通构成直接挑战。英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋表示：「这项历史性的合作将英伟达的 AI 与加速计算平台与英特尔的 CPU 及 x86 生态系统紧密结合，为下一代计算奠定基础。」

Affected by this news, Nvidia's stock price rose by over 3%, while Intel surged 22.8%, marking its largest single-day gain since October 1987. AMD and TSMC, on the other hand, fell by nearly 4% and 2% respectively. Industry insiders believe that Nvidia's endorsement will significantly boost Intel's market confidence and may also change the global chip manufacturing landscape. 受此消息影响，英伟达股价上涨逾 3%， 英特尔大涨 22.8%，创 1987 年 10 月以来最大单日涨幅。 而 AMD 与台积电则分别下跌近 4% 与 2%。业内人士认为，英伟达的背书将显著提升英特尔的市场信心，也可能改变全球芯片制造格局。

Intel CFO David Zinsner previously stated that the company currently has a healthy cash position and will gradually expand its factories based on market demand in the future. New CEO Chen Liwu has pledged to streamline operations and focus on efficient capacity building. 英特尔 CFO David Zinsner 此前曾表示，公司目前现金状况良好，未来将根据市场需求逐步扩建工厂。新任 CEO 陈立武则承诺将精简运营，并专注于高效产能建设。

Both parties have not yet announced the launch date for their first joint products, but have confirmed that they will release "multiple generations of products" and provide chips to each other to build new-generation platforms. It is widely believed in the industry that this cooperation will be a key turning point in the AI chip market. 双方尚未公布首批联合产品的上市时间，但已确认将推出「多代产品」，并互相提供芯片以打造新一代平台。业内普遍认为，这一合作将成为 AI 芯片市场的关键转折点。

Additionally, according to 36Kr Auto, Nvidia has internally launched a Robotaxi project, planning to use end-to-end neural networks combined with reinforcement learning technology to build a sample fleet with L4-level autonomous driving capabilities. The project is led by Nvidia Senior Director Ruchi Bhargava and is expected to be launched in cities across the United States in the future, with an initial investment of up to $3 billion . 此外，据 36 氪汽车报道，英伟达已在内部启动 Robotaxi 项目，计划采用端到端神经网络结合强化学习技术，打造具备 L4 级 自动驾驶能力的样本车队。该项目由英伟达高级总监 Ruchi Bhargava 负责，预计未来将在美国落地开城， 初期投入高达 30 亿美元 。

item.title: 携程被约谈
item.guid: 携程被约谈
item.description:
Yesterday, People's Daily reported that, according to a notice from the "Zhengzhou Market Supervision" WeChat official account, the Zhengzhou Market Supervision Bureau legally conducted an administrative interview with the operating entity of Ctrip.com. 昨天，人民日报报道，据「郑州市场监管」微信公众号通报，郑州市市场监管局依法对携程旅行网运营主体进行了行政约谈。

Upon investigation, the platform was found to have engaged in unreasonable restrictions on the transactions and prices of operators within the platform by utilizing service agreements, transaction rules, and technical means, violating Article 35 of the "E-commerce Law of the People's Republic of China" and Article 24 of the "Interim Provisions on Anti-Unfair Competition in the Network." 经调查，该平台存在利用服务协议、交易规则及技术手段，对平台内经营者的交易及价格进行不合理限制的行为，违反了《中华人民共和国电子商务法》第三十五条及《网络反不正当竞争暂行规定》第二十四条的相关规定。

Previously, the regulatory authorities had issued a "Notice of Order for Correction" to the enterprise on September 4. This interview required Ctrip to complete rectification tasks such as revising contract terms and optimizing pricing tools within a specified period, and to establish and improve a long-term compliance mechanism to prevent similar problems from recurring. 此前，监管部门已于 9 月 4 日向企业下达《责令改正通知书》。本次约谈要求携程在规定期限内完成合同条款修订、调价工具优化等整改任务，并建立健全长效合规机制，防止类似问题再次发生。

The meeting emphasized that internet platform enterprises should earnestly enhance their awareness of the rule of law, actively accept supervision, adhere to the principle of integrity, eliminate unreasonable restrictive behaviors such as "forced activation and inability to exit," and truly respect merchants' independent operating rights. At the same time, it strictly prohibits manipulating prices or restricting transactions through technical means in disguise, and actively fosters an open, fair, and transparent market environment. 会议强调，互联网平台企业应切实增强法治意识，主动接受监管，坚守诚信原则，杜绝「强制开通、无法退出」等不合理限制行为，真正尊重商户自主经营权。同时，严禁通过技术手段变相操控价格或限制交易，积极营造开放、公平、透明的市场环境。

The Zhengzhou Market Supervision Bureau stated that it will continue to track the progress of rectification, conduct acceptance inspections in accordance with the law, urge enterprises to fully implement their primary responsibilities, and jointly maintain a fair and orderly online market environment. 郑州市市场监管局表示，将持续跟踪整改进展，依法开展验收检查，督促企业全面落实主体责任，共同维护公平有序的网络市场秩序。

item.title: 苹果承认 iPhone 17 拍照现黑色方块
item.guid: 苹果承认-iPhone-17-拍照现黑色方块
item.description:
According to MacRumors, Apple has confirmed an issue with abnormal images appearing on iPhone Air and iPhone 17 Pro cameras and plans to fix it in a subsequent software update. This issue causes black squares and white ripples to appear in photos, affecting shooting quality. 据 MacRumors 报道，苹果已对 iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 摄像头出现异常图像的问题进行确认，并计划在后续发布的软件更新中修复。该问题会导致照片中出现黑色方块和白色波纹，影响拍摄效果。

It is reported that Henry Casey, an editor at CNN Underscored, discovered this issue while taking photos with an iPhone Air at a concert. He stated that "approximately 1 out of every 10 photos taken would show black blocked areas and white ripples," and these abnormal images were caused by strong light interference from the on-site LED display. 据悉，CNN Underscored 的编辑 Henry Casey 在音乐会现场使用 iPhone Air 拍照时发现了该问题。他表示「大约每拍摄 10 张照片，就有 1 张会出现黑色遮挡区域和白色波纹」，这些异常图像来自于现场 LED 显示屏的强光干扰。

Apple responded, stating that "in rare cases, when LED lights are extremely bright and shine directly on the camera, this issue may be triggered." Currently, Apple has confirmed that it is developing a fix and will push it out in a subsequent software update, but has not yet announced a specific timeline. 苹果方面回应称「在极少数情况下，当 LED 灯光显示极为明亮并直接照射摄像头时，可能会触发该问题」。目前，苹果已确认正在开发修复方案，并将在后续的软件更新中推送，但尚未公布具体时间表。

Additionally, the iPhone 17 series officially went on sale today in mainland China, and the first batch of users will receive their new devices in the coming days. 此外，iPhone 17 系列已于今日在中国大陆全面开启发售，首批用户将在未来几天陆续收到新机。

According to Sina Technology, the Apple retail store in Sanlitun, Beijing, once again saw a queuing spectacle. With the official release of the iPhone 17 series, the first batch of users who successfully reserved their pickups rushed to offline stores, and the atmosphere on site was enthusiastic. 据新浪科技，北京三里屯 Apple 零售店门前再度上演排队盛况。随着 iPhone 17 系列正式发售，首批成功预约取货的用户纷纷赶往线下门店，现场气氛热烈。

According to users on site, a large number of consumers had been queuing at the entrance since 7:00 AM, with the line extending to the street corner at one point. 据现场用户分享，自早上 7:00 起，已有大批消费者在门口排队等候，队伍一度延伸至街角。

item.title: 特斯拉正在重新设计车门把手
item.guid: 特斯拉正在重新设计车门把手
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Tesla is redesigning its car door handles, intending to integrate electronic and manual release mechanisms into a single button to improve intuitiveness and operability in "emergency situations." 据彭博社报道，特斯拉正重新设计车门把手，拟 将电子与手动释放机制整合为单一按钮 ，以提升在「紧急情况下」的直观性与可操作性。

According to Tesla's chief designer Franz von Holzhausen, the electronic and manual release devices are currently located in different positions, making it difficult for some passengers, especially those in the back seat, to find the manual release in time after a power outage or accident. 据特斯拉首席设计师 Franz von Holzhausen 介绍，目前电子与手动释放装置分处不同位置，部分乘客在车辆断电或事故后难以及时找到手动释放，尤其是后排乘客。

It is reported that the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) had previously launched an investigation into door handle failures in some models, involving approximately 174,300 2021 Model Y vehicles. 据悉，美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）此前已就部分车型门把手失灵展开调查，涉及约 17.43 万辆 2021 款 Model Y。

The investigation stemmed from multiple incidents of external handle failure and passengers being trapped inside vehicles, including cases of children being trapped. Since 2018, NHTSA has received over 140 related complaints. 调查缘于多起外部把手失效、乘客被困车内的事件，其中包括儿童被困案例。自 2018 年以来，NHTSA 已收到超过 140 起相关投诉。

Tesla, on its part, stated that the new design solution will balance aesthetics and safety, and that it is studying relevant details in the Chinese market to address regulatory trends in some regions regarding fully concealed door handles. 特斯拉方面则表示，新的设计方案将兼顾美观与安全，并在中国市场研究相关细节，以应对部分地区对全隐藏式门把手的监管趋势。

item.title: 追觅 CEO：造车对标布加迪，手机跟华为小米「三分天下」
item.guid: 追觅-CEO：造车对标布加迪，手机跟华为小米「三分天下」
item.description:
According to Sina Technology, citing sources, Dreame Technology clarified its aggressive future layout in the two major fields of automobiles and mobile phones at an internal meeting. 据新浪科技援引知情人士消息报道，追觅科技在内部会议上明确了未来在汽车与手机两大领域的激进布局。

Yu Hao, founder and CEO of Dreame, stated that its automotive business will be divided into two major brands, "Dreame Auto" and "Starry Sky Auto." The former will focus on ultra-luxury pure electric and extended-range models comparable to Bugatti, while the latter will target high-end SUV markets such as Cullinan and Bentley, with planned models capable of "completely competing with Li Auto." 追觅创始人兼 CEO 俞浩表示，旗下汽车业务将分为「追觅汽车」与「星空汽车」两大品牌，前者主打对标布加迪的超豪华纯电与增程车型，后者则锁定库里南、宾利等高端 SUV 市场，规划车型可「完全 PK 理想汽车」。

It is reported that the exterior and interior of the "Dreame-Bugatti" model have been finalized and will debut at the CES exhibition in the US at the end of the year, offering electric and extended-range versions. Starry Sky Auto will launch Bentley-comparable models with 3.2m and 3.3m wheelbases, covering multiple price ranges from 269,900 to 589,900 yuan. Yu Hao emphasized the strategy of "one body achieving four configurations," referencing the Xiaomi model, striving for full market dominance in the high-end segment. 据悉，「追觅-布加迪」车型外观与内饰已定，将于年底美国 CES 展首发，提供电动与增程式版本；星空汽车则将推出 3.2 m 与 3.3 m 轴距的宾利对标车型，覆盖 26.99 万至 58.99 万多个价格区间。俞浩强调「一个车体实现四种配置」的策略，参考小米模式，力求在高端市场实现全线压制。

Regarding the mobile phone business, Yu Hao frankly stated that "Dreame, Huawei, and Xiaomi will divide the world into three parts in the future," positioning products in the high-end market above 5,000 yuan. 在手机业务方面，俞浩直言「追觅、华为、小米未来要三分天下」，并将产品定位于 5000 元以上的高端市场。

Currently, Dreame has significantly expanded its exhibition area at the IFA show and plans to launch a "human-car-home-universe ecosystem," while also incubating the MOVA brand to enter major home appliances, large kitchen appliances, televisions, and other fields. 目前，追觅已在 IFA 展会上大幅扩展展区，并计划推出「人－车－家－宇宙万物生态」，同时孵化 MOVA 品牌进军大家电、大厨电、电视等领域。

item.title: 本月乘用车终端销量预计将达 220 万辆
item.guid: 本月乘用车终端销量预计将达-220-万辆
item.description:
Yesterday, the China Automobile Dealers Association released its "Passenger Car Market Bi-Weekly Report for September 2025," which showed that the passenger car market continued to maintain positive year-on-year growth in August 2025, with overall performance exceeding expectations. 昨天，中国汽车流通协会发布「2025年9月乘用车市场半月报」，报告显示 2025 年 8 月乘用车市场继续保持同比正增长，整体表现好于预期。

The report pointed out that this trend primarily benefited from the superposition of multiple factors such as "release of rigid demand for car purchases during the back-to-school season," "818 Car Shopping Festival and multi-location auto show promotions," and "intensive launch of new cars." 报告指出，这一趋势主要受益于「开学季购车刚需释放」「818 购车节及多地车展促销」「新车密集上市」等多重因素叠加。

Key Data and Policy Highlights: 核心数据与政策亮点：

    Eight departments including the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology issued the "Work Plan for Stabilizing Growth in the Automobile Industry (2025-2026)":

    Full-year automobile sales target for 2025 is approximately 32.3 million units, a year-on-year increase of about 3%

    Among them, the new energy vehicle sales target is approximately 15.5 million units, a year-on-year increase of about 20%

    The added value of the automobile manufacturing industry is expected to increase by about 6% year-on-year

    The trade-in policy continues to gain momentum: As of September 10, the number of applications has reached 8.3 million. The fourth batch of 69 billion yuan in subsidies is expected to be disbursed in October, covering the entire year's consumption cycle.

Market Performance and Trends: 市场表现与趋势：

    Sales in the first half of September increased by 5.5% compared to the same period in August, but decreased by 24.2% compared to the second half of August.

    Order volume in the first half of September increased by 2.0% month-on-month compared to the same period in August, indicating an early release of demand for National Day and wedding celebrations.

    Dealer inventory slightly decreased by 0.7% compared to the end of August, actively preparing for the "Golden September, Silver October" peak season.

The report also pointed out that with over 30 new cars launched at the Chengdu Auto Show, and the Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day holidays approaching, coupled with local auto shows and dealer quarter-end sales promotions, passenger traffic and sales are expected to significantly increase in the second half of September. The association predicts that total passenger vehicle retail sales for September are expected to reach 2.2 million units . 报告还指出，随着成都车展超 30 款新车集中上市，以及中秋、国庆双节临近，叠加地方车展与经销商季度末冲量促销，预计 9 月下半月客流与销量将显著提升。协会预测， 9 月全月乘用车终端零售有望达到 220 万辆 。

item.title: 微信员工回应「去重瘦身脚本」：无效且有风险
item.guid: 微信员工回应「去重瘦身脚本」：无效且有风险
item.description:
Recently, a so-called "WeChat quick deduplication and slimming Python code" has been circulating online, claiming that running it in the PC version of WeChat can delete duplicate files and free up storage space. In response, WeChat employee "Kecun Xiao Jiang" responded on Weibo, explicitly stating that the method is "ineffective and risky." 近日，网络上流传一段所谓的「微信迅速去重瘦身 Python 代码」，声称在电脑版微信中运行后即可删除重复文件，从而释放存储空间。对此，微信员工「客村小蒋」在微博平台上进行了回应，明确指出该方法「无效且有风险」。

This code is useless for solving storage occupation issues and may instead lead to some very troublesome consequences. It is strongly advised not to try it lightly.

According to reports, some users believe that WeChat repeatedly stores the same file when forwarding it, leading to a large number of files with suffixes like "(1)" and "(2)" appearing in folders. However, WeChat explained that the actual situation is that the client uses hard link technology, where the same file is only stored once, and suffix files are only used to avoid naming conflicts, not to indicate duplicate storage. 据介绍，部分用户认为微信在转发同一文件时会重复存储，导致文件夹中出现大量带有「(1)」「(2)」等后缀的文件。然而，微信方面解释称，实际情况是客户端采用了硬链接技术，同一份文件只会存储一次，后缀文件仅用于避免重名冲突，并不代表重复占用空间。

Regarding the circulating Python script, WeChat employees pointed out that its logic is overly simplistic and crude: it directly searches for and deletes files whose names contain suffixes like "(1)" and "(2)". This approach not only fails to optimize storage but may also accidentally delete user files that legitimately have similar suffixes, leading to data loss. 对于流传的 Python 脚本，微信员工指出其逻辑过于简单粗暴：直接搜索并删除文件名中包含「(1)」「(2)」等后缀的文件。这种做法不仅无法带来存储优化，还可能误删用户本身命名带有类似后缀的文件，造成数据丢失。

Files forwarded in WeChat are not duplicated in storage, so this brings no actual benefit; if some filenames legitimately have such suffixes, they would be directly deleted.

item.title: 中文互联网基础语料3.0正式发布
item.guid: 中文互联网基础语料3.0正式发布
item.description:
Recently, at the Artificial Intelligence Security Governance Sub-forum of the 2025 National Cybersecurity Awareness Week held in Kunming, "Chinese Internet Basic Corpus 3.0" was officially released to the public. This corpus was jointly launched by the China Cyberspace Security Association and the National Computer Network Emergency Response Technical Team/Coordination Center of China (CNCERT/CC), further upgrading from the previous 1.0 and 2.0 versions. 日前，在昆明举行的 2025 年国家网络安全宣传周人工智能安全治理分论坛上，「中文互联网基础语料 3.0」正式面向社会发布。该语料由中国网络空间安全协会联合国家互联网应急中心等单位共同推出，在前期 1.0 和 2.0 版本的基础上进一步升级。

According to reports, this released corpus, under the guidance of relevant departments of the Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission and relying on the co-construction and sharing mechanism of the AI Security Governance Professional Committee, gathered a large amount of high-quality and credible data from enterprises, universities, and research institutions. After strict processing including source screening, content filtering, and data deduplication, it finally formed a corpus resource totaling 120GB . 据介绍，本次发布的语料在中央网信办相关部门指导下，依托人工智能安全治理专委会的共建共享机制，汇聚了来自企业、高校和科研机构的大量高质量可信数据。经过信源筛选、内容过滤、数据去重等严格处理，最终形成了总量达 120GB 的语料资源。

Compared to the previous two generations, version 3.0 has expanded the scope of high-quality Chinese website sources and further strengthened the ability to filter illegal and undesirable information, providing more reliable data support for large model training and AI development. Users can download the relevant corpus after registering and authenticating on the official website of the China Cyberspace Security Association. 与前两代相比，3.0 版本扩大了优质中文网站信源范围，并进一步加强了违法不良信息的过滤能力，可为大模型训练和人工智能发展提供更为可靠的数据支持。用户可通过中国网络空间安全协会官网注册认证后下载相关语料。

The association stated that "Chinese Internet Basic Corpus 3.0" is an important achievement of multi-party collaboration in co-building high-quality Chinese corpus. In the future, it will continue to unite forces from various industries to continuously promote corpus construction, providing strong support for AI technology innovation and industrial development. 协会方面表示，「中文互联网基础语料 3.0」是多方协同共建高质量中文语料的重要成果，未来将继续联合各行业力量，持续推进语料建设，为人工智能技术创新和产业发展提供有力保障。

item.title: 锤子科技新增 2 条失信被执行人信息
item.guid: 锤子科技新增-2-条失信被执行人信息
item.description:
According to the China Enforcement Information Disclosure Network, Smartisan Technology (Chengdu) Co., Ltd. has added 2 pieces of information regarding dishonest judgment debtors. The total execution amount for the two cases exceeds 20 million yuan, with both cases marked as "unfulfilled." The executing court is the Haidian District People's Court of Beijing. 中国执行信息公开网显示，锤子科技（成都）股份有限公司新增 2 条失信被执行人信息，两起案件的执行标的总额超过 2000 万元，履行情况均为「未履行」，执行法院为北京市海淀区人民法院。

The case numbers for the two cases against Smartisan Technology are "(2025) Jing 0108 Zhi 21573" and "(2025) Jing 0108 Zhi 21574" respectively. 本次锤子科技被执行的两个案件的案号分别为「(2025) 京 0108 执 21573 号」和「(2025) 京 0108 执 21574 号」。

According to the announcement, the company was established in May 2012, with Guan Zhiliang as its legal representative. Its registered capital is approximately 31.498 million RMB, and its business scope includes computer software and hardware technology development, basic software services, application software services, and more. 公告信息显示，该公司成立于 2012 年 5 月，法定代表人为管志良，注册资本约 3149.8 万人民币，经营范围涵盖计算机软硬件技术开发、基础软件服务、应用软件服务等。

Furthermore, shareholder information shows that the company is jointly held by Luo Yonghao, Chengdu Dongfang Guangyi Investment Co., Ltd., Beijing Mingjiang Huizhi Investment Management Partnership (Limited Partnership), and others. Luo Yonghao serves as the chairman of the company. 此外，股东信息显示，公司由罗永浩、成都东方广益投资有限公司、北京明匠汇智投资管理合伙企业（有限合伙）等共同持股，罗永浩在该公司担任 董事长 。

The newly added information regarding dishonest judgment debtors has once again drawn external attention to Smartisan Technology's operational status. 本次新增的失信被执行人信息，再次引发外界对锤子科技经营状况的关注。

item.title: Meta 推出全景扫描方案：几分钟即可将现实空间搬进 VR 世界
item.guid: Meta-推出全景扫描方案：几分钟即可将现实空间搬进-VR-世界
item.description:
Yesterday, Meta officially launched the new "Hyperscape Panoramic Scan" solution for its Quest 3 / 3S VR headsets at the Connect conference. This feature can quickly capture real-world scenes and transform them into virtual reality spaces. Users only need to wear the headset and complete a spatial scan "within minutes." The data is then uploaded to a server for rendering, and the real environment can be recreated in VR hours later. 昨天，Meta 在 Connect 大会上正式为旗下 Quest 3 / 3S VR 头显推出全新的「Hyperscape 全景扫描」方案。该功能可将现实场景快速捕捉并转化为虚拟现实空间，用户只需佩戴头显，在「几分钟内」即可完成空间扫描，随后数据会上传至服务器进行渲染，数小时后便能在 VR 中重现真实环境。

According to reports, Hyperscape uses 3D scanning technologies such as Gaussian mapping and point clouds to achieve high-precision modeling without the need for professional scanners. Examples released by Meta include scenes like home kitchens, recording studios, and personal rooms. Tech Crunch commented that 'the accuracy of these models is astonishing, almost indistinguishable from those created by a $300 consumer VR device.' 据介绍，Hyperscape 采用高斯贴图与点云等三维扫描技术，能够在无需专业扫描仪的情况下实现高精度建模。Meta 公布的示例包括家庭厨房、录音室以及个人房间等场景，科技媒体 Tech Crunch 评价称「这些模型的精度令人惊讶，几乎看不出是由售价 300 美元的消费级 VR 设备完成的」。

Currently, this feature, under the name 'Hyperscape Capture,' is available to Quest 3 / 3 Pro users who signed up for Early Access, temporarily supporting only personal browsing. Meta stated that in the future, this feature will be integrated into Horizon Worlds, allowing users to invite friends to explore virtualized real spaces together. 目前，该功能以「Hyperscape Capture」的名义向报名 Early Access 的 Quest 3 / 3 Pro 用户开放，暂时仅支持个人浏览。Meta 表示，未来将把该功能整合进 Horizon Worlds，让用户能够邀请好友一同探索虚拟化的真实空间。

item.title: OpenAI 与 Gemini 同斩 ICPC 2025 金牌
item.guid: OpenAI-与-Gemini-同斩-ICPC-2025-金牌
item.description:
On September 18, the ICPC (International Collegiate Programming Contest) Global Finals witnessed a historic moment: both OpenAI and Google Gemini inference models won gold medals, with OpenAI sweeping the field with a perfect score , becoming the only team to solve all problems, shocking the global programming community. 9 月 18 日，ICPC（国际大学生程序设计竞赛）全球总决赛迎来历史性一刻：OpenAI 与谷歌 Gemini 推理模型双双斩获金牌，其中 OpenAI 更是以 满分 成绩横扫全场，成为唯一全解团队，震撼全球编程界。

In the 5-hour competition, participating teams had to solve 12 difficult algorithmic problems. Gemini successfully tackled 10 of them and cracked the 'death problem C,' which no human team could solve, within 30 minutes. OpenAI, on the other hand, crushed 139 human teams with a perfect score of 12/12, becoming the only team to achieve an AK (All Kill) record. 在为期 5 小时的比赛中，参赛队伍需解决 12 道高难度算法题。Gemini 成功攻克其中 10 题，并在 30 分钟内破解所有人类队伍未能解决的死亡 C 题。而 OpenAI 则以 12/12 的满分成绩碾压 139 支人类队伍，成为唯一实现 AK（All Kill）战绩的团队。

It's worth noting that among the models used by OpenAI, 11 problems were directly completed by GPT-5, while the last and most difficult problem was solved by an undisclosed experimental inference model , drawing significant attention to the next generation of AI inference capabilities. 值得注意的是，OpenAI 所用模型中，11 道题目由 GPT-5 直接完成，最后一道最难题则由 尚未公开的实验性推理模型 解决，引发外界对下一代 AI 推理能力的高度关注。

Google revealed that Gemini 2.5 Deep Think was not specifically trained for ICPC but used the same model as in Gemini applications, with only enhanced inference capabilities. This model quickly solved 8 problems within the first 45 minutes of the competition, ultimately earning a gold medal with 10 problems solved. 谷歌方面透露，Gemini 2.5 Deep Think 并未为 ICPC 进行专门训练，而是使用与 Gemini 应用中相同的模型，仅在推理能力上做了增强。该模型在比赛前 45 分钟内迅速解出 8 题，最终以 10 题成绩获得金牌。

The research team behind OpenAI also posted 8 consecutive tweets on social media to celebrate the victory and disclosed the identities of some key researchers. These include Borys Minaiev, a member of the ICPC 2015 World Champion team, and Jakub Pachocki, OpenAI's Chief Scientist – also an ICPC gold medalist. OpenAI 背后的研究团队也在社交平台连发 8 条推文庆祝胜利，并公开了部分关键研究人员身份。其中包括 ICPC 2015 世界冠军成员 Borys Minaiev 以及 OpenAI 首席科学家 Jakub Pachocki —— 同样是 ICPC 金牌得主。

Dr. BILL POUCHER, ICPC Global Executive Director, stated: 'AI winning gold medals at ICPC signifies that artificial intelligence tools now possess the ability to define the next generation of academic standards. It will not only assist programmers in solving problems but also play a huge role in fields such as drug design and chip development.' ICPC 全球执行董事 BILL POUCHER 博士表示：「AI 在 ICPC 上斩获金牌，标志着人工智能工具已具备定义下一代学术标准的能力。它不仅能辅助程序员解决问题，更将在药物设计、芯片开发等领域发挥巨大作用。」

item.title: DeepSeek 发布严正声明
item.guid: DeepSeek-发布严正声明
item.description:
On the evening of September 17, AI company DeepSeek issued a statement saying that recently, unscrupulous individuals have been impersonating the company or its employees, forging work IDs, business licenses, and other materials, and charging users fees under the guise of 'computing power leasing,' 'equity financing,' and other names on multiple platforms to commit fraud. The official statement emphasized that this behavior severely infringes upon user rights and damages the company's reputation. 9 月 17 日晚，人工智能公司深度求索（DeepSeek）发布声明称，近期有不法分子冒充公司或在职员工，伪造工牌、营业执照等材料，在多个平台以「算力租赁」「股权融资」等名义向用户收取费用实施诈骗。官方强调，该行为严重侵害用户权益，并对公司声誉造成损害。

DeepSeek explicitly stated in its announcement: 深度求索在声明中明确指出：

    The company has never asked users to pay to personal or unofficial accounts; any request for private transfers constitutes fraud;

    Any act of impersonating the company to conduct 'computing power leasing,' 'financing,' or similar activities is illegal, and the company will pursue legal responsibility.

Furthermore, DeepSeek reminds users that information should be obtained through official channels, and its official website and App products are currently free. 此外，深度求索提醒用户，获取信息应通过官方渠道，其官网及 App 产品目前均为免费。

item.title: 面壁智能发布 0.5B 参数语音模型，声音复刻逼真如人类
item.guid: 面壁智能发布-0.5B-参数语音模型，声音复刻逼真如人类
item.description:
On September 18, Minibox AI, in collaboration with Tsinghua University Shenzhen International Graduate School's Human-Computer Speech Interaction Lab, officially launched VoxCPM, a foundational speech generation model. This model has a parameter size of 0.5B and has achieved industry-leading SOTA levels in speech naturalness, timbre similarity, and prosodic expressiveness. 9 月 18 日，面壁智能联合清华大学深圳国际研究生院人机语音交互实验室正式推出语音生成基座模型 VoxCPM。该模型参数规模为 0.5B，在语音自然度、音色相似度及韵律表现力方面均达到了业内 SOTA 水平。

    Performance: RTF ≈ 0.17, supports streaming output. VoxCPM performs excellently in Seed-TTS-EVAL tests, with extremely low word error rates and human-level similarity in timbre cloning tasks. It achieves an inference speed of RTF ≈ 0.17 on an NVIDIA RTX 4090 graphics card, meeting the demands for high-quality real-time interaction.

    Listening Experience: Excellent emotion, accent, and prosody. The model can automatically select an appropriate voice style based on the text content, generating various speech scenarios such as weather broadcasts, pre-war speeches, and dialect anchors. It supports bilingual (Chinese and English) replication, can 'reproduce original sound' with very few samples, and can even read mathematical formulas and symbols.

    Technical Architecture: Integrating language modeling and diffusion generation. VoxCPM adopts an end-to-end diffusion autoregressive architecture, integrating hierarchical language modeling and local diffusion generation techniques. Core modules include LocEnc, TSLM, RALM, and LocDiT, achieving efficient generation and reconstruction of continuous speech features through VAE encoders and decoders.

Currently, VoxCPM has been open-sourced on multiple platforms such as GitHub and Hugging Face. Developers can freely download and experience it, and also quickly try it out via the online PlayGround. An audio sample page has also been launched simultaneously. 目前 VoxCPM 已在 GitHub、Hugging Face 等多个平台开源，开发者可自由下载与体验，还可通过线上 PlayGround 快速试用，音频样例页面也已同步上线。

    Hugging Face: https://huggingface.co/openbmb/VoxCPM-0.5B

    ModelScope: https://modelscope.cn/models/OpenBMB/VoxCPM-0.5B

item.title: ChatGPT 上线 GPT-5 Thinking 思考时长调整功能
item.guid: ChatGPT-上线-GPT-5-Thinking-思考时长调整功能
item.description:
OpenAI announced today on the X platform the launch of the GPT-5 Thinking adjustment feature for Plus, Pro, and Business users, allowing users to freely choose the model's thinking duration to find a suitable balance between speed and intelligence. OpenAI 今日在 X 平台宣布，为 Plus、Pro 和 Business 用户推出 GPT-5 Thinking 调整功能，允许用户自由选择模型的思考时长，以便在速度与智能程度之间找到合适的平衡。

This update first covers the ChatGPT web version, and users can switch in the drop-down menu of the message input box: 此次更新首先覆盖 ChatGPT 网页版，用户可在消息输入框的下拉菜单中进行切换：

    Standard Mode: As the new default option, it balances response speed and intelligence.

    Extended Mode: Continues the previous default settings for Plus users, allowing for deeper thinking but longer response times.

    Lightweight Mode (Pro exclusive): Generates responses at the fastest speed, suitable for scenarios requiring instant feedback.

    Heavy Mode (Pro exclusive): Performs the deepest level of reasoning, with the slowest response speed, suitable for complex problems.

Once a user selects a thinking mode, this setting will remain unchanged in subsequent web-based conversations until manually altered. 用户一旦选择思考模式，该设置将在后续网页端对话中保持不变，直到手动更改。

According to previous reports, OpenAI is also developing a "Kids' ChatGPT," designed for users under 18, which will block explicit content and contact parents or relevant authorities when necessary to ensure the safety of minors. 据此前报道，OpenAI 还在开发「儿童版 ChatGPT」，专为未满 18 岁用户设计，将屏蔽露骨内容，并在必要时联系家长或相关部门，以保障未成年用户的安全。

item.title: 华为徐直军时隔六年再谈芯片进展
item.guid: 华为徐直军时隔六年再谈芯片进展
item.description:
According to a report by Yicai, on September 18, at the Huawei Connect 2025 conference, Huawei Vice Chairman and Rotating Chairman Xu Zhijun publicly discussed chip progress again after six years. 据第一财经报道，9 月 18 日，在全联接大会 2025 上，华为副董事长、轮值董事长徐直军时隔六年再次公开谈及芯片进展。

He revealed that Huawei has planned multiple Ascend chips for the next three years, including 950PR, 950DT, and Ascend 960 and 970. Among them, the 950PR will be launched externally in the first quarter of 2026 and will adopt self-developed HBM technology. 他透露，未来三年华为已规划多款昇腾芯片，包括 950PR、950DT 以及昇腾 960 和 970。其中，950PR 将于 2026 年第一季度对外推出，并采用自研 HBM 技术。

Xu Zhijun emphasized: "Computing power has been, and will continue to be, key to artificial intelligence, and even more so to China's artificial intelligence." He pointed out that Huawei is building "supernode + cluster" computing power solutions based on domestically available chip manufacturing processes to meet the continuously growing AI demand. 徐直军强调：「算力过去是，未来也将继续是人工智能的关键，更是中国人工智能的关键。」他指出，华为正基于国内可获得的芯片制造工艺，打造「超节点 + 集群」算力解决方案，以满足持续增长的 AI 需求。

At the conference, Huawei released the Atlas950 SuperPoD and Atlas960 SuperPoD supernodes, supporting 8192 and 15488 Ascend cards respectively, with computing power, memory capacity, and interconnect bandwidth all at a world-leading level. Concurrently, Huawei also launched the supernode clusters Atlas950 SuperCluster and Atlas960 SuperCluster, with computing power scales exceeding 500,000 cards and reaching one million cards, respectively. 在大会现场，华为发布了 Atlas950 SuperPoD 与 Atlas960 SuperPoD 超节点，分别支持 8192 张与 15488 张昇腾卡，算力、内存容量及互联带宽均处于全球领先水平。同时，华为还推出了超节点集群 Atlas950 SuperCluster 与 Atlas960 SuperCluster，算力规模分别超过 50 万卡和达到百万卡。

Notably, Huawei also introduced supernode technology to the general-purpose computing field for the first time, releasing the world's first general-purpose computing supernode TaiShan 950 SuperPoD, which, combined with the GaussDB distributed database, aims to replace mainframes, minicomputers, and Exadata database appliances. 值得注意的是，华为还将超节点技术首次引入通用计算领域，发布全球首个通用计算超节点 TaiShan 950 SuperPoD，结合 GaussDB 分布式数据库，目标是取代大型机、小型机及 Exadata 数据库一体机。

Xu Zhijun stated frankly in his speech that despite facing numerous challenges, Huawei is confident in achieving breakthroughs and becoming the world's strongest in computing power: 徐直军在演讲中直言，尽管目前面对诸多挑战，但华为有信心实现突破，做到世界算力最强：

Because we are subject to US sanctions and cannot send our designs to TSMC for manufacturing, there is a gap in the computing power of our single chips compared to Nvidia. However, Huawei has over thirty years of experience in connecting people and machines, so we have heavily invested in and achieved breakthroughs in connection technology, enabling us to build ten-thousand-card level supernodes, thereby consistently achieving the world's strongest computing power!

item.title: 消息称 ColorOS 16 将于 10 月 15 日发布
item.guid: 消息称-ColorOS-16-将于-10-月-15-日发布
item.description:
SmartPrix recently reported that OPPO will officially release its new system, ColorOS 16, based on Android 16, on October 15, and it will first be featured on the upcoming Find X9 series models. SmartPrix 于日前报道称，OPPO 将在 10 月 15 日正式发布基于 Android 16 的全新系统 ColorOS 16，并率先搭载于即将登场的 Find X9 系列机型。

The report states that ColorOS 16 introduces a brand-new "Liquid Glass UI" design language. The overall interface adopts translucent and layered glass texture elements, combined with smooth dynamic animations, to create a more futuristic visual experience. 报道中称，此次 ColorOS 16 带来了全新的「Liquid Glass UI」设计语言，整体界面采用半透明与分层玻璃质感元素，配合流畅的动态动画，营造出更具未来感的视觉体验。

At the functional level, ColorOS 16 will add full-screen always-on display, redesigned lock screen widgets, and richer personalization options. Meanwhile, the system's underlying architecture has also been optimized, improving overall smoothness and response speed. The Photos app has also been revamped, further enhancing the imaging experience. 在功能层面，ColorOS 16 将新增全屏息屏显示、重新设计的锁屏小组件，以及更丰富的个性化选项。同时，系统底层也进行了优化，提升了整体流畅度与响应速度。相册应用也迎来焕新，进一步强化了影像体验。

The report also mentioned that the Find X9 series will be among the first models to come pre-installed with ColorOS 16. It is understood that this series is expected to be equipped with the Dimensity 9500 SoC and a flagship imaging system, with "Danxia Original Color Lens" as a standard feature across all models. 报道中还提到，Find X9 系列将成为首批预装 ColorOS 16 的机型。据悉，该系列预计配备天玑 9500 SoC 与旗舰级影像系统，并全系标配「丹霞原彩镜头」。

item.title: 机构：三季度中国智能手机销量同比下降 3%
item.guid: 机构：三季度中国智能手机销量同比下降-3%
item.description:
According to the latest report released by research firm Counterpoint, in the first eight weeks of Q3 2025, China's smartphone sales declined by approximately 3% year-on-year, with the overall market entering a period of adjustment. 调研机构 Counterpoint 发布的最新报告显示，2025 年第三季度前八周，中国智能手机销量同比下降约 3%，市场整体进入调整期。

The report points out that market performance this quarter showed significant differentiation: 报告指出，本季度市场表现分化明显：

  • vivo and Honor experienced significant declines, becoming the main reasons for the overall downturn. vivo 与荣耀 出现大幅下滑，成为整体下跌的主要原因。
  • OPPO achieved the strongest growth thanks to a more complete product lineup, with the Reno 14 series selling well due to its combination of flagship features and mid-range pricing. OPPO 凭借更完善的产品阵容实现最强劲增长，其中 Reno 14 系列因兼具旗舰功能与中端价位而热销。
  • Huawei maintained positive growth by optimizing its supply chain and continuously strengthening its presence in the mid-range market, with the Nova 14 series and Mate 70 series performing exceptionally. 华为 依靠供应链优化及中端市场的持续发力保持正向增长，Nova 14 系列与 Mate 70 系列表现突出。
  • Xiaomi and Apple experienced single-digit declines, but the iPhone 16 Pro series remained stable after price adjustments. 小米与苹果 出现个位数下滑，但 iPhone 16 Pro 系列在价格调整后依旧保持稳健。

Counterpoint predicts that China's smartphone market will experience a slight decline in Q3 2025, but full-year sales are expected to remain flat compared to last year. Counterpoint 预计，2025 年第三季度中国智能手机市场将小幅下跌，但全年销量有望与去年持平。

item.title: 💡 宇树科技副总：机器人还是要「进厂打工」
item.guid: 💡-宇树科技副总：机器人还是要「进厂打工」
item.description:
According to a report by The Paper, at the recent 2025 World Energy Storage Conference, Du Xinfeng, Deputy General Manager of Unitree Robotics, stated that while humanoid robots are widely popular in entertainment performances, combat, and dance, their true value lies in entering factories to perform complex operations and heavy, repetitive tasks. He frankly said: 据澎湃新闻报道，在日前的 2025 世界储能大会上，宇树科技副总经理杜鑫峰表示，人形机器人虽然在文娱表演、格斗和舞蹈等场景中广受关注，但其真正的价值仍在于进入工厂，承担复杂操作和繁重、重复的工作。他直言：

In practical applications, humanoid robots are more of a future mode of operation; besides providing emotional value, they are more about working in factories .

Du Xinfeng introduced that with the breakthrough of large AI models in the past two years, the robotics industry is shifting from a "full-stack" model to a "division of labor" model: hardware is handled by hardware companies, learning is entrusted to model companies, and industry applications are completed through professional scenario training, ultimately achieving rapid deployment through the combination of hardware and models. This is also a significant reason for the rapid rise of humanoid robots in 2024 and 2025. 杜鑫峰介绍，随着近两年 AI 大模型的突破，机器人产业正从「打通关」模式转向「分工」模式：硬件由硬件公司负责，学习交给模型公司，行业应用则由专业场景训练完成，最终通过硬件与模型的结合实现快速落地。这也是人形机器人在 2024 年、2025 年迅速走红的重要原因。

It is worth noting that Unitree Robotics recently signed a "Power + Embodied AI" framework cooperation agreement with State Grid Hangzhou Power Supply Company, Embodied Intelligence Base Company, and State Grid Zhejiang Huadian Research Institute, planning to conduct in-depth cooperation in platform construction, scientific and technological research, standard setting, and talent training. 值得注意的是，宇树科技近期与国网杭州供电公司、具身智能基地公司、国网浙江华电研究院签署了「电力 + 具身智能」框架合作协议，计划在平台建设、科技攻关、标准制定和人才培养等方面展开深度合作。

Du Xinfeng revealed that the company has launched a unified large model, which is first trained through a twin platform and then quickly applied on-site, aiming to create a "what you see is what you get, plug-and-play" robot model. 杜鑫峰透露，公司已推出统一大模型，通过孪生平台先行训练，再在现场快速应用，目标是打造「所见即所得、即插即用」的机器人模式。

According to public data, Unitree Robotics' annual sales of robot dogs reached 23,700 units in 2024, accounting for nearly 70% of the global market; humanoid robot deliveries exceeded 1,500 units. Wang Xingxing, the company's founder and CEO, also emphasized that Unitree's goal is to make robots truly "work," liberating and improving productivity, rather than just staying at the performance level. 根据公开数据，2024 年宇树科技机器狗年销量达到 2.37 万台，占全球市场近 70%；人形机器人交付超过 1500 台。公司创始人兼 CEO 王兴兴也强调，宇树的目标是让机器人真正「干活」，解放并提升生产力，而不仅仅停留在表演层面。

Currently, Unitree Robotics is in the IPO coaching stage and is expected to submit its IPO documents between October and December, with relevant operational data to be disclosed accordingly. 目前，宇树科技正处于上市辅导阶段，预计将在 10 月至 12 月间提交 IPO 文件，相关运营数据也将随之披露。

item.title: 38.98 万元，2026 款腾势 N9 上市
item.description:
On September 17, the 2026 Denza N9 was officially launched, with three models: Zunrong, Zunyue, and Flagship, starting at an official guide price of 389,800 yuan. The new car features advanced upgrades both inside and out, making it excellent and even more outstanding. 9 月 17 日，2026 款腾势 N9 正式上市，新车共推出尊荣型、尊越型、旗舰型 3 款车型，官方指导价 38.98 万元起。新车做到了内外进阶升级推新，出色，更出众。

In terms of exterior, the new car continues the family design language and offers four two-tone body colors: "Purple Rong Gold, Red Ya Gold, Blue Chen Silver, Green Hua Silver," as well as a "Frost Cloud Tea" single-color exterior, further enriching consumers' personalized choices. 外观方面，新车延续家族化设计语言，并提供「紫瑢金、红雅金、蓝辰银、绿华银」4 款双色车身及「霜云茶」单色外观，进一步丰富消费者的个性化选择。

For the interior, the 2026 Denza N9 is equipped with a new generation intelligent cockpit system, featuring a 17.3-inch central control screen, a 15.6-inch passenger entertainment screen, and a full LCD instrument cluster, supporting multi-screen interaction and expansion of the vehicle's ecosystem. 内饰部分，2026 款腾势 N9 搭载全新一代智能座舱系统，配备 17.3 英寸中控屏、15.6 英寸副驾娱乐屏及全液晶仪表，支持多屏联动与车机生态扩展。

It's worth mentioning that the new car comes standard with the Yisangfang, Yunlian-A intelligent air suspension, and Tian Shen Zhi Yan B advanced intelligent driving assistance system across all models. At the same time, the new car also introduces cutting-edge technologies such as the intelligent anti-motion sickness system and parking space-to-parking space navigation assistance. 值得一提的是，新车全系标配易三方、云辇-A 智能空气悬架、天神之眼 B 高阶智能驾驶辅助系统。同时，新车还引入定眩智能防晕车系统、车位到车位领航辅助等前沿科技。

The 2026 Denza N9 further enhances its intelligent experience, supporting whole-vehicle OTA upgrades covering multiple modules such as driving assistance, cockpit entertainment, and energy management, achieving continuous functional evolution and experience optimization, realizing "internal and external advanced upgrades and new introductions." 2026 款腾势 N9 在智能化体验上进一步强化，支持整车 OTA 升级，涵盖驾驶辅助、座舱娱乐、能量管理等多个模块，实现功能持续进化与体验优化，实现「内外进阶升级推新」。

In terms of power, the 2026 Denza N9 uses a plug-in hybrid-specific 2.0T high-efficiency engine and an EHS electric hybrid system. Its pure electric range under CLTC conditions can reach 200 kilometers, with a comprehensive range exceeding 1,000 kilometers, and it supports DC fast charging and external discharge functions. 动力方面，2026 款腾势 N9 采用插混专用 2.0T 高效发动机与 EHS 电混系统，CLTC 工况纯电续航可达 200 公里，综合续航超过 1,000 公里，并支持直流快充与对外放电功能。

item.title: 豆包 · 深度思考模型上车，上汽荣威 M7 DMH 首发搭载
item.guid: 豆包-·-深度思考模型上车，上汽荣威-M7-DMH-首发搭载
item.description:
Recently, SAIC Roewe announced the official launch of the M7 DMH. The new car globally debuts with the "Doubao Deep Thinking Model," bringing a truly "AI smart cockpit that can think deeply." 日前，上汽荣威宣布 M7 DMH 正式上市，新车全球首发搭载「豆包·深度思考模型」，带来真正「会深度思考的 AI 智舱」。

According to reports, the Roewe M7 DMH, leveraging the capabilities of this model, can perform deep inference on users' vague instructions and, combined with its long-term memory function, accurately understand users' true intentions. For example, when a user says "I want to take a nap," the car system can automatically link to perform operations such as adjusting the temperature, reducing the fan speed, and closing the windows, providing an interactive experience closer to human thinking. 据介绍，荣威 M7 DMH 借助该模型的能力，可以对用户的模糊指令进行深度推理，并结合长期记忆功能，精准理解用户真实意图。例如，当用户说出「我想眯一会」，车机可自动联动执行调节温度、降低风量、关闭车窗等操作，提供更贴近人类思维的交互体验。

It's worth noting that the Roewe M7 DMH has the industry's most vehicle control ports, supporting multi-task linkage execution in complex scenarios. For instance, with a single command like "Help me put the child to sleep," the car system can simultaneously perform a series of operations such as "raise the temperature, lower the fan speed, close the windows, reduce voice volume, and play a bedtime story." 值得一提的是，荣威 M7 DMH 拥有行业最多的车控端口，支持复杂场景下的多任务联动执行。比如一句「帮我哄孩子睡觉」，车机可同时完成「调高温度、调低风量、关闭车窗、降低语音音量、播放哄睡故事」等一系列操作。

Additionally, the Roewe M7 DMH's "fuzzy semantic understanding" function covers 15 key car usage scenarios, upgrading from "command-driven" to "intention-driven." At the same time, the car system possesses industry-leading "memory penetration capability," able to remember users' historical interactions, geographical locations, and preferences while ensuring privacy and security. 此外，荣威 M7 DMH 的「模糊语义理解」功能覆盖 15 个重点用车场景，从「指令驱动」升级为「意图驱动」。同时，车机具备行业领先的「记忆贯穿能力」，在保障隐私安全的前提下，能够记住用户的历史交互、地理位置与偏好。

item.title: Meta 发布 AI 运动智能眼镜
item.guid: Meta-发布-AI-运动智能眼镜
item.description:
At the Connect conference, Meta unveiled its new generation of sports smart glasses, "Oakley Meta Vanguard." This product is positioned for high-intensity sports scenarios, featuring the concept of "Athletic Intelligence," aiming to help athletes push their limits through AI technology. 在 Connect 大会上，Meta 发布了全新一代运动智能眼镜「Oakley Meta Vanguard」。这款产品定位于高强度运动场景，主打「Athletic Intelligence」概念，旨在通过 AI 技术帮助运动员突破极限。

  • Sports-specific design: Equipped with Oakley's three-point fit system, supporting three replaceable nose pads, compatible with cycling helmets and hats. The frame has an IP67 dustproof and waterproof rating, adapting to extreme environments. 运动专属设计：配备 Oakley 三点式贴合系统，支持三种可替换鼻托，兼容骑行头盔与帽子。镜框具备 IP67 防尘防水等级，适应极端环境。
  • Visual and auditory experience: Utilizes Oakley PRIZM lens technology to block sunlight, wind, sand, and dust. Open-ear speaker volume is increased by 6 decibels, paired with a five-microphone array to effectively reduce wind noise. 视觉与听觉体验：采用 Oakley PRIZM 镜片技术，阻挡阳光、风沙与灰尘。开放式扬声器音量提升 6 分贝，搭配五麦克风阵列，有效降低风噪。
  • Battery life performance: Up to 9 hours of single charge use, and up to 6 hours of continuous music playback. The charging case provides an additional 36 hours of power, and can charge to 50% in just 20 minutes. 续航表现：单次续航最长 9 小时，连续音乐播放可达 6 小时。充电盒可额外提供 36 小时电量，20 分钟即可充至 50%。
  • Smart features: Supports linkage with sports platforms like Garmin and Strava. Users can query real-time data such as heart rate and pace via voice, or automatically capture video clips of key moments during exercise. 智能功能：支持与 Garmin、Strava 等运动平台联动。用户可通过语音实时查询心率、配速等数据，或在运动中自动捕捉关键时刻的视频片段。
  • Imaging capabilities: Built-in 12-megapixel wide-angle camera, supporting up to 3K video recording, and offering slow-motion, time-lapse photography, and video stabilization modes. 影像能力：内置 1200 万像素广角摄像头，支持最高 3K 视频录制，并提供慢动作、延时摄影与视频防抖模式。

The Oakley Meta Vanguard will go on sale simultaneously in multiple markets including the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, France, and Germany on October 21st, priced at $499. It will subsequently launch in markets such as Mexico, India, Brazil, and the UAE. Oakley Meta Vanguard 将于 10 月 21 日在美国、加拿大、英国、法国、德国等多个市场同步开售，售价为 499 美元。后续还将登陆墨西哥、印度、巴西及阿联酋等市场。

item.title: 「三星版 Vision Pro」发布或将跳票
item.guid: 「三星版-Vision-Pro」发布或将跳票
item.description:
Korean media etnews reported that Samsung Electronics has adjusted the release dates for several new products. Among them, the first XR headset, "Project Moohan," originally scheduled to debut on September 29th, will be postponed to an online release on October 21st (October 22nd Korean local time). Sources indicate that the delay is related to internal marketing strategy coordination and the progress of completion acceptance. 韩媒 etnews 报道称，三星电子内部对多款新品的发布时间进行了调整。其中，原定于 9 月 29 日亮相的首款 XR 头显「Project Moohan」将推迟至 10 月 21 日（韩国当地时间 10 月 22 日）线上发布。消息人士指出，此次延期与内部营销策略协调及竣工验收进度有关。

It is reported that "Project Moohan" will have the following hardware features: 据悉，「Project Moohan」将具有以下硬件特性：

  • Qualcomm Snapdragon XR2+ Gen 2 chip 高通骁龙 XR2+ Gen 2 芯片
  • 16GB RAM 16GB 内存
  • Approximately 3800 ppi OLEDoS type Micro OLED microdisplay 约 3800 ppi 的 OLEDoS 型 Micro OLED 微显示器
  • Supports automatic interpupillary distance (IPD) adjustment to enhance wearing comfort 支持自动瞳距（IPD）调节，提升佩戴适配度

    • Built-in eye tracking and gesture recognition, with planned support for VR motion controllers

In addition to XR headsets, Samsung's first tri-folding smartphone, "TriFold," originally planned for release at the end of September, will also be delayed, now expected to debut at another event in late October or November at the earliest. Another smart glasses product, "Project Haean," is scheduled to appear in early 2026. 除了 XR 头显外，三星原计划在 9 月底一同发布的首款三折叠智能手机「TriFold」也将延后，预计最早在 10 月底或 11 月的另一场活动上登场。而另一款智能眼镜「Project Haean」则被安排在 2026 年初亮相。

item.title: 8 月全球手游收入排行出炉，《王者荣耀》位列第二
item.guid: 8-月全球手游收入排行出炉，《王者荣耀》位列第二
item.description:
Yesterday, market research firm Sensor Tower released the TOP10 global mobile game revenue and download charts for August 2025. 昨天，市场研究机构 Sensor Tower 公布了 2025 年 8 月全球手游收入与下载量排行榜 TOP10。

Data shows that "Last War: Survival Game" has consistently topped the global revenue charts for several months, thanks to its season-end events and multiple promotions. "Honor of Kings" rose to 2nd place in revenue rankings due to its collaboration events with the novel "Lord of the Mysteries" and the anime "Fox Spirit Matchmaker." "Whiteout Survival" maintained its 3rd position, while "MONOPOLY GO!" and "Royal Match" entered the top five. 数据显示，《Last War: Survival Game》凭借赛季末活动与多重促销，连续数月稳居全球收入榜首。《王者荣耀》则凭借与小说《诡秘之主》及动漫《狐妖小红娘》的联动活动，收入排名升至第 2 位。《Whiteout Survival》保持第 3，《MONOPOLY GO!》与《Royal Match》跻身前五。

In terms of download rankings, "ROBLOX" continued to hold the global number one spot, attracting more young players thanks to cross-industry collaborations with Lady Gaga, BABYMETAL, and the US Open. "Free Fire" jumped to 2nd place in downloads due to its collaboration event with "Naruto Shippuden." "Block Blast!" and "Pizza Ready!" also made it into the top five. 在下载榜方面，《ROBLOX》继续蝉联全球第一，得益于与 Lady Gaga、BABYMETAL 以及美国网球公开赛的跨界合作，吸引了更多年轻玩家。《Free Fire》凭借与《Naruto Shippuden》的联动活动，下载量跃升至第 2 位。《Block Blast!》与《Pizza Ready!》同样进入前五。

Overall, global player spending on mobile games in August 2025 across the App Store and Google Play was approximately $7.15 billion, a 1% increase month-over-month. The U.S. market continued to rank first with $2.3 billion (accounting for 32%), while the Chinese iOS market and the Japanese market held shares of 15.3% and 12.8% respectively. 整体来看，2025 年 8 月全球玩家在 App Store 与 Google Play 的手游消费支出约为 71.5 亿美元，环比增长 1%。其中，美国市场以 23 亿美元（占比 32%）继续稳居第一，中国 iOS 市场与日本市场则分别占据 15.3% 与 12.8% 的份额。

Notably, "Pokémon GO" ranked first in the August revenue growth chart, benefiting from the "GO Fest 2025 Global Finals" and "Pokémon World Championships" collaboration events, with its revenue ranking rising to 8th place. 值得注意的是，《Pokémon GO》在 8 月收入增长榜中位列第一，受益于「GO Fest 2025 全球总决赛」及「宝可梦世界锦标赛」联动活动，收入排名升至第 8 位。

In terms of download charts, hyper-casual game "Steal n Catch the Brainrot" soared to the top of the growth chart within weeks, thanks to its unique "brainrot" character design and viral spread. "Kpop Piano Beats – Music Game" quickly gained popularity due to the K-pop craze, ranking 2nd on the growth chart. "Valorant Mobile: Origin Action" directly entered the global download growth chart at 5th place after its debut in the Chinese market. 下载榜方面，超休闲游戏《Steal n Catch the Brainrot》凭借独特的「脑腐」角色设计与病毒式传播，在短短数周内冲上增长榜首。《Kpop Piano Beats – Music Game》则凭借 K-pop 热潮迅速走红，跻身增长榜第 2 位。而《无畏契约：源能行动》在中国市场首发后，直接进入全球下载增长榜第 5。

item.title: 蜜雪冰城回应柠檬水断货
item.guid: 蜜雪冰城回应柠檬水断货
item.description:
Recently, consumers have reported on social media that they encountered out-of-stock situations when purchasing lemonade at Mixue Ice City stores in various locations. 近日，有消费者在社交平台反映，在蜜雪冰城多地门店购买柠檬水时遇到缺货情况。

Caijing quoted sources reporting that Mixue Ice City's lemonade supply is tight in some regional stores, primarily because a recent batch of imported lemons was delayed due to weather. Meanwhile, lemons from the Sichuan-Chongqing producing area have entered their harvesting season but require a period of storage to optimize their taste, thus not yet fully put into use. 第一财经援引知情人士消息报道，蜜雪冰城柠檬水在部分地区门店出现供应紧张，主要原因是近期一批进口柠檬因天气影响延迟到港。同时，川渝产区柠檬已进入采摘期，但需经过一段时间储存以优化口感，因此暂未全面投入使用。

The source emphasized that the overall lemon reserves are currently sufficient, with large quantities of imported lemons about to arrive. Stored lemons have also passed evaluations and meet usage standards, and will be gradually distributed to stores nationwide. The lemonade shortage is expected to be alleviated in the short term. 该人士强调，目前柠檬整体储备充足，大量进口柠檬即将到港，储存中的柠檬也已通过评测，符合使用标准，将陆续下发至各地门店。预计柠檬水缺货情况将在短期内得到缓解。

Furthermore, according to sources from Caizhong News Agency, a Mixue Ice City employee revealed that amidst the delivery platform competition, "Mixue's own lemon bases simply cannot meet the demand of so many stores, leading to current imports from Chile. These lemons are small, prone to bitterness, and very sour." 此外，据财中社方面消息，有蜜雪冰城工作人透露，在外卖大战的背景下，「蜜雪自家的柠檬基地根本无法满足这么多门店需求，导致现在都从智利进口了，然后柠檬又小，而且容易苦，特别酸。」

item.title: 雀巢中国研发「一号位」变动
item.guid: 雀巢中国研发「一号位」变动
item.description:
Foodaily reported that Nestlé Group, the world's largest food company, recently announced significant personnel adjustments within its Greater China R&D organization. Sun Zhongwei, the current General Manager of Nestlé R&D China, will be transferred to a new position, and his successor will be Guglielmo Bonora, the current head of the Singapore Regional R&D Center and Ice Cream R&D team. This appointment will officially take effect on October 1, 2025. 小食代报道，全球最大食品公司雀巢集团日前宣布，其大中华区研发组织迎来重要人事调整。现任雀巢研发中国总经理孙忠伟将调任新职，接手者为现任新加坡区域研发中心及冰淇淋研发团队负责人 Guglielmo Bonora，该任命将于 2025 年 10 月 1 日正式生效。

It is understood that behind this adjustment, Nestlé is optimizing its Greater China R&D model to support regional transformation and accelerated development. The company stated that it will accelerate the implementation of R&D by "simplifying processes and focusing on strategic pillars," and establish closer collaborative relationships with business, category teams, and its global expert network. 据悉，此次调整背后，是雀巢正在优化大中华区研发模式，以支持区域转型与加速发展。公司方面表示，将通过「简化流程、聚焦战略支柱」的方式，加快研发落地速度，并与业务、品类团队及全球专家网络建立更紧密的协作关系。

According to information, Bonora joined Nestlé in 2004 and has held positions in Italy, Switzerland, the Middle East, and Singapore, possessing extensive market and R&D experience. He previously spearheaded the establishment of an external innovation ecosystem at the Singapore R&D Center and led teams to successfully launch brands such as KITKAT, MILO, and NESCAFÉ in multiple markets. 资料显示，Bonora 于 2004 年加入雀巢，曾在意大利、瑞士、中东及新加坡等地任职，拥有丰富的市场与研发经验。他曾推动新加坡研发中心建立对外创新生态系统，并带领团队实现 KITKAT、MILO、NESCAFÉ 等品牌在多个市场的成功上市。

On the other hand, Sun Zhongwei will lead a special project focused on the development of food businesses in Greater China and neighboring Asia-Pacific markets, continuing to deepen regional innovation. Since joining Nestlé in 2008, Sun Zhongwei has driven the launch of multiple ready-to-drink coffee and dairy new products, and during his tenure, he led the R&D and release of innovative products such as N³ Probiotic Milk. 另一方面，孙忠伟将领导一项专注于大中华区及邻近亚太市场食品业务发展的特别项目，继续深耕区域创新。孙忠伟自 2008 年加入雀巢以来，曾推动多款即饮咖啡与奶品新品上市，并在任期内主导了 N³ 亲体奶等创新产品的研发与发布。

Nestlé emphasized that its future R&D organization will be more "lean and agile," and plans to establish a new "Deep Tech Center" to enhance innovation capabilities and R&D efficiency. The company's annual global R&D investment is approximately 1.7 billion Swiss francs (about 14.6 billion RMB), demonstrating its high regard for R&D innovation. 雀巢方面强调，未来研发组织将更「精简、敏捷」，并计划设立全新的「深度科技中心」，以增强创新能力和研发效率。公司每年在全球研发上的投入约 17 亿瑞士法郎（折合人民币约 146 亿元），显示出对研发创新的高度重视。

item.title: 电影《731》要求侵权方立即停止传播
item.guid: 电影《731》要求侵权方立即停止传播
item.description:
Yesterday, the official Weibo account for the film "731" issued a solemn statement, asserting that it recently discovered unauthorized dissemination of film content by some online platforms and individuals through theater piracy, live streaming, and other means, which severely infringes upon the producer's copyright and legitimate rights. 昨天，电影《731》官微发布郑重声明称，近期发现部分网络平台及个人未经授权，通过影院盗摄、网络直播等方式非法传播影片内容，严重侵犯了制片方的著作权及合法权益。

The statement pointed out that the infringing acts involve various aspects of the film's content, including clips, plot, character images, and audio-visual materials. These actions not only violate laws and regulations such as the "Copyright Law of the People's Republic of China" and the "Regulations on the Protection of the Right to Communicate Works to the Public over Information Networks," but also mislead the public and disrupt the film's normal creative and dissemination order. 声明指出，相关侵权行为涉及影片片段、剧情、人物形象、音像素材等多方面内容，不仅违反了《中华人民共和国著作权法》《信息网络传播权保护条例》等法律法规，也对社会公众造成误导，破坏了影片的正常创作与传播秩序。

The producer emphasized in the statement: "We hereby solemnly demand that all infringing parties immediately cease dissemination, remove all infringing content, and eliminate any negative impact." 制片方在声明中强调：「现严正要求所有侵权方立即停止传播、下架所有侵权内容，并消除不良影响。」

Currently, this topic has quickly topped Weibo's trending searches, sparking widespread discussion. 目前，该话题已迅速登上微博热搜，引发广泛讨论。

item.title: 《创：战神》定档 10 月 17 日
item.description:
The sci-fi action film Tron: Ares , produced by Walt Disney Pictures, has been confirmed for release in the United States on October 10, with its mainland China release scheduled for October 17 . 华特迪士尼影业出品的科幻动作片《创：战神》（Tron: Ares）已确认将于 10 月 10 日 在美国上映，中国大陆档期则定于 10 月 17 日 。

The film is directed by Joachim Rønning, and stars Jared Leto, Greta Lee, Evan Peters, Jodie Turner-Smith, Hasan Minhaj, and Jeff Bridges, among others. 影片由乔阿吉姆·罗恩尼执导，主演包括杰瑞德·莱托、格蕾塔·李、伊万·彼得斯、朱迪·特纳-史密斯、哈桑·明哈杰以及杰夫·布里吉斯等。

The plot revolves around the highly intelligent program 'Ares'. As an AI entity from the digital world, Ares is dispatched to the real world to execute high-risk missions, an action that will trigger humanity's first direct confrontation with artificial intelligence. 剧情围绕高度智能程序「阿瑞斯」（Ares）展开。作为来自数字世界的人工智能体，阿瑞斯被派遣至现实世界执行高危任务，这一行动将引发人类与人工智能的首次正面碰撞。

The film has a runtime of 142 minutes and its genres include action, sci-fi, and adventure. As a standalone sequel to 2010's Tron: Legacy , Tron: Ares not only continues the series' cyberpunk style but will also further explore the boundaries between the virtual and real worlds. 影片片长 142 分钟，类型涵盖动作、科幻与冒险。作为 2010 年《创：战纪》的独立续作，《创：战神》不仅延续了系列的赛博朋克风格，还将进一步探索虚拟世界与现实世界的边界。

item.title: 恐怖片《同甘共苦》上映档期调整
item.guid: 恐怖片《同甘共苦》上映档期调整
item.description:
September 18 news: The horror film Together Through Thick and Thin , originally scheduled to be released in mainland China on September 19, has officially announced an 'adjustment to its release schedule', meaning the film will not meet audiences as originally planned. 9 月 18 日消息，原定于 9 月 19 日在内地上映的恐怖片《同甘共苦》官方宣布「调整上映档期」，影片将不会按照原计划与观众见面。

Currently, the filmmakers have not yet announced a new release date, nor have they disclosed the specific reasons for the schedule adjustment. The film had previously garnered attention from some moviegoers due to its subject matter and atmosphere, and the news of its withdrawal sparked considerable discussion among netizens. 目前，片方尚未公布新的上映日期，也未透露档期调整的具体原因。该片此前因题材和氛围受到部分影迷关注，撤档消息一出，引发不少网友讨论。

On social media platforms, some viewers expressed, 'I already bought tickets, but then it was suddenly pulled,' while others speculated that the film might have been temporarily adjusted due to market scheduling or other factors. 在社交平台上，有观众表示「已经买好票，结果突然撤档」，也有人猜测影片可能因市场排片或其他因素而临时调整。
